title: "UW professor proposes developing sex robots for older disabled adults"
excerpt: "As social isolation continues to be a problem for those with disabilities ages 65 and older, a University of Washington professor is considering how robots could be developed to provide senior citizens welcome companionship and even sexual fulfillment."
